channel.title: kaggle on Bodacious Blog

item.title: Playing with Kaggle, R and ESS
item.description: Build the script kag This is used for Downloading datasets to an organised directory structure Viewing CSV results in visidata by default Keeping track of history Caching results #!/bin/bash export TTY ( hs "$(basename "$0")" "$@" "#" "<==" "$(ps -o comm= $PPID)" 0</dev/null ) &>/dev/null is_tty() { # If stout is a tty [[ -t 1 ]] } slug="$(echo "$3" | slugify)" dsname="$(echo "$3" | sed 's=.*/==')" if test "$1$2" = "datasets download"; then cd $DUMP$NOTES/ws/kaggle/datasets if test -d "$slug"; then zcd "$slug" exit 0 fi mkdir -p "$slug" cd "$slug" kaggle "$@" unzip "$dsname".
